info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 12 at 1:39PM MDT until April 12 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 001... 079...252 AND 253... * Affected Area...In Colorado...Fire Weather Zone 252 Yuma. * Timing...Through sunset this evening. * Winds...Northwest at 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * Relative Humidity...15 to 20 percent. * Impacts...Extreme and unpredictable fire behavior. Any fires that start may rapidly grow and spread out of control.
info.instruction: Avoid outdoor burning. Repeating, outdoor burning is not advised today. Any fires that start may rapidly grow and spread out of control.
